title: Projects
text:
these are some of the projects i worked on

PyVNT Node Editor (FOSSEE)
A visual node-based editor for creating case files for OpenFOAM, developed during my summer fellowship at FOSSEE, IIT Bombay. This app acts an interface to the PyVNT library.
Tech Stack: Python(PyQt6), Git, YAML
View on GitHub ‚Üí


OvaryWise
A comprehensive health webapp focused on PCOS management. Built to help users check symptoms, and get personalized health insights but not to replace any health advisor. A hobby project, might not give reliable results.
Tech Stack: JavaScript, HTML, CSS
View on GitHub ‚Üí


TimeHover
An extension that converts timezone references to your local time on any webpage.
Tech Stack: JavaScript
View on GitHub ‚Üí

title: Hello!
text:
i‚Äôm navya, a third year undergrad in Computer Science, python programmer, problem solver and an open-source advocate.
this portfolio website is an effort to increase my digital presence. The logo and background were designed in piskel. Canva and Adobe were used for further editing.

title: About
text:
i‚Äôm a third year undergrad in Computer Science.i spend most of my time tinkering, cascading my way through the tabs in the internet‚Äôs winding rabbit hole, reading novels, journaling and ocassionally taking my frustration out on twitter.
currently, i am a mentee at Codess.Cafe(a pro bono mentorship for women) and sktime(a library for time series). I‚Äôm keen at improving my dsa and exploring data science and ML.
i like tech which impacts people‚Äôs lives in a good way. art, history, or science entwined makes it interesting even more for me.
